alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:16PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Elko County through 245 PM PDT... At 215 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Lamoille, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Moderate to heavy rainfall is possible with this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamoille Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
